about_the_game:
CYBERSTELLAR - Shoot them.

"If you like challenges, then this game is for you!"

First game rendered in 3D Pixel (2D Rendered Voxel). Animations following the example of some animations from some "3D pixel movie".

"Unique graphics and unique music make this Shoot 'Em Up Pixels-3D a work of art."

An impactful and striking Shoot 'Em Up game:
* 8 beautiful enigmatic levels.
* 4 powerful weapon upgrades - 2 of them temporary.
* Gorgeous Soundtrack and beautiful sound effects.
* Storms.
* Details such as fog, sandstorm, blizzard, glass, ice and meteors, for artistic aesthetics contribute to a pleasant and striking look.

"For those who like to appreciate art, at the same time they play, they also glimpse."

History:

In the distant future, terrestrial civilization managed to make a home on the Planet Mars, and after some time, unexpectedly, a great eclipse and storms between the planets.

In the face of planetary eclipses, in the midst of some storms, alien invasions also occur attacking Planet Earth and Planet Mars.

Earthlings and Martians ask for help; and to help them, the first spacecraft designed for space warfare, called CYBERSTELLAR, enters the picture.

"Attention warrior chosen for this mission! The life of Earthlings and Martians depends on your effort, but remember, beware of some storms, as they can make you lose control of CYBERSTELLAR.

Good luck!


(Commander X)




Observation:
Achievements and trading cards are planned for the near future.

name: CYBERSTELLAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Protect Earth and Mars from alien attacks, but be careful not to lose control of the ship in the midst of storms.
